## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G46620](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G46620)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtRDUF1, BTL10, RDUF1</u>
- **Gene Name:** Arabidopsis thaliana RING and Domain of Unknown Function 1117 1, BCA2 zinc finger ATL 10, RING and Domain of Unknown Function 1117 1
- **Description:**   zinc finger (C3HC4-type RING finger) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2075175
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
